docs.snippet: An imperfect tale of high-frequency trading provides a much needed spark....
docs.lead_paragraph: An imperfect tale of high-frequency trading provides a much needed spark.
docs.abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column praises Michael Lewis book Flash Boys for shining light on high-frequency trading firms and methods they use to maintain an advantage and fix the market; acknowledges book has flaws, but holds it is both compelling and persuasive enough to draw attention to important issue.

keywords.value: Flash Boys: A Wall Street Revolt (Book)

docs.snippet: Andrew and Aaron Harrison have been praised for their talent and criticized for their demeanors, but they have found their footing recently with the Wildcats....
docs.lead_paragraph: Andrew and Aaron Harrison have been praised for their talent and criticized for their demeanors, but they have found their footing recently with the Wildcats.
docs.abstract: Profile of twins Andrew and Aaron Harrison, starting backcourt for the Kentucky Wildcats, who have begun to live up to hype as team prepares for the Final Four; twins, who have been both praised for their talent and criticized for their demeanors, have begun to contemplate a future in the NBA.

headline.main: Polarizing Wildcats Find Their Way Together
headline.print_headline: Polarizing Wildcats Find Their Way Together
